673346977.name: SurvivalStuffV2
673346977.desc: Dangalong's Survival Stuff mod allows the use of edible foraged herbs (including medicinal ones) in recipes as spices. Herbs that were not formally edible are now edible (like wild garlic and plantain) because they are in real life. Comfrey can also be made into a tea. All medicinal herbs can still be used normally to cure ailments as specified in the base game. Frogs and wild eggs are also updated to be usable in recipes, but are now perishable (as they should be). Herbs are still non-perishable because they can theoretically be usable when dried. Also adds the ability to boil ripped sheets into sterilized rags: recipe needs 10 ripped sheets + pot of water, cook on a heat source until "clean" (no unhappy), then remove the rags from the pot. And now you can also preserve strawberries, blackberries, and blueberries by jarring (needs empty jars, jar lids, sugar and water, then cook the jars). Updated 4/26/16 for build 34.

922447170.name: Medieval Zomboid
922447170.desc: Medieval Zomboid is the first version of a map/city 300x300 located in Muldraugh, cell 34x34 Coords: 10400 x 10340Year 2100. Humanity survived the Zombie apocalypse but failed to eliminate the virus. Over time, much of the knowledge of the old world has been lost and there has been a regression in the Middle Ages, a new Middle Ages where past and future mingle. A group of survivors, 100 years earlier, had been allocated to the west of Muldraugh to escape the many hordes of zombies. There, their camp became a village and then, over the decades, a big city. The city was surrounded by a wall 50 meters high and thick 10. For 83 years life was quietly gone, the human race had flourished inside the walls, while the outside was all in ruin. On May 10, 2017, this was all changed. A major explosion over the night had woken the entire district, the walls had fallen and the zombies, after a long, 100-year-old outburst, had poured into them. That was a night of chaos, terror and death!The King died and the few survivors have fled. Can you rebuild the walls and the city by making it return to the glory of a time?Inside the city you can find:-A Castle-Medieval Joust-Central Market-a forge for weaponsmith and amorsmith ecc.Coords: 10400 x 10340 Cell: 34x34

2009645877.name: Craft Soap IWBUMS 41
2009645877.desc: This mod lets you craft soap.Cut fat from zombies (you need to have corpse in inventory). Burn Log or zombie unusable meat to ashes (need to be near campfire). Run pot with water though ashes and you will get lye. Combine lye in pot with zombie fat and you will have raw soap mass. Cook for a bit, remove cooked soup with a knife.I wanted to add sustainable source for fats, but trappable animals don’t have a lot of fat. Maybe in future versions there will be an option to collect fat from animals.In the plans, there are also foragable items to use as a soap, but not sure into what category to add them.Process of crafting soap is a bit simplified, few steps are skipped.

2521330369.name: Subpar Survivors
2521330369.desc: You will find other Survivors to join you. They'll always be subpar compared to multiplayer, but they can still add a lot to the game.This is an extension of nolanritchie's Superb Survivors. I've optimized it to reduce the performance impact, and added some balance changes and fixes to the AI routines to behave better. Also includes bugfixes for most of the in-game errors I've encountered, and improved compatibility with Gunfighter and Brita's.You must have Superb Survivors activated first before activating this mod. Build 41 is required.It is suggested that you start a new save when enabling this mod. If you add it to an existing save with Superb Survivors, it will delete any Survivors from that game.Changes from Superb Survivors are too numerous to list, but include:* Fixed compalitibility issues with Brita's mods and added guns & armor to NPC spawn tables* Prevent NPCs from trying to open locked windows forever* Don't consider spoons and forks to be proper weapons* Better food prioritization (they'll eat fresh cooked food before unopened cans, etc.)* Gender-specific outfits* Better outfit randomization* Improved search algorithm to more efficiently find nearby items* Don't keep looking for food when they just checked and found none* Backpacks are properly equipped now* NPCs now have perks* Lots of null reference errors fixed (prevents scary red box numbers)* More likely to run away when unarmed* Survivors now wash themselves* "Safe Base" setting now works properly* Fix "stair deaths" in many cases (it still seems to happen sometimes, but should be less frequent now)* Better handling of stuck survivors* Cannibalism* Smarter reloading (survivors will only reload when it's safe or their gun is completely empty)* Backpack spawn is now based on time passed (only small packs in the beginning, larger packs possible as game goes on)* Fixed bug with groups that resulted in Survivors getting assigned to the wrong group* Guard order now sends them to the guard area instead of standing still* Preset spawns get real names* Remove zombies immediately surrounding new survivor spawns (so they don't get eaten right away)* Prison start fixes with key and guard ammo spawns* New base task system prioritizes jobs based on skill and number already doing it* Survivors will do some jobs in the rain if they're not already wet* New clean inventory task* Wild survivors will now start their own bases and barricade* Defaults: weapons spawn rate increased, presets disabled, safe base on* New "Companion" role added when directed to "Follow" so they'll stay with you even in base* Food and weapon gifts have increased relationship boost* Added a debug command to spawn trained soldiers* Can now rename survivors* Added more details to info window* Give up on entering windowless buildings* Chop wood task will now use all possible axe types (including stone axe)* Broken axes are returned to the tool storage* Survivors won't take off clothing when cleaning inventory* Fixed infinite dog food eating bug* Farmers won't plant new crops, will only water, harvest, and replant the same crop* Survivors will go to the forage area to forage* Reduced search range to gather wood* Lock door sound error* Avoid getting stuck in loops when trying to loot unreachable areasCredits:nolanritchie: for the amazing foundation they laid in the Superb Survivors mod.Arsenal[26]-DontUse2SilencerMods: GunFighter mod compatibility code.Fox: For testing and brainstorming ideas.EpiKality: Brita's compatibility and item spawns.Sardas: NPC Damage and run speed fixes for 41.51+ compatibility.

2063897867.name: Unique Firearm Progression
2063897867.desc: Changes all firearms to be more unique, and adds a sense of progression to firearms.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In general, revolvers and shotguns are easy to use for characters with a low skill level in firearms, but do not gain much from a high level user. This makes them good for training a characters level if they did not spec into guns at all. Rifles are a good middle ground, where they are somewhat easy for low to mid level characters, but also gain a lot from high levels in shooting. Semi automatic handguns are difficult for low level shooting characters, but become one of the best options at high shooting levels, thanks to a low sound radius, low weight, and greater ability to be used while moving.                                                                                                                                                                            ~~~Check the steam page for a more in depth changelog for each gun!

Replace X with your desired barricade health.

If it doesn't work, I probably didn't do something right. <LINE> - This differs from Hyzo's mod in that Hyzo manually has provide each item name to change. The risk with their method is it may miss new vanilla weapons (without update from Hyzo) and will definitely miss modded weapons. However, this mod has a risk of changing "Weapon" type items that it shouldn't. Pick your risk flavor accordingly. <LINE> - This may work on previous  <RGB:1,1,0.5> 41.x  <RGB:0.7,0.7,0.7> versions and maybe even  <RGB:1,1,0.5> 40.x  <RGB:0.7,0.7,0.7> versions. I didn't test them so give it a shot and post in the mod comments if it worked or not.

673346613.name: RabbitPeltTanningV2
673346613.desc: Dangalong's Rabbit Pelt Tanning mod allows you to get pelts from skinning dead rabbits, cure the pelts and make them into a fur coat for extra warmth in winter. Recipes based loosely on a real-life tanning method (salt+acid cure). Trapping level 3 needed for all new recipes plus Hunting Knife for skinning. Tanning solution requires bucket, water, salt, and battery for acid, and has 5 uses per batch. After tanning, each pelt must be manually worked to produce a finished pelt. Raw pelts can rot if left unfinished for too long. Rotten or burnt pelts cannot be tanned. 20 finished pelts plus needle and thread are needed to make the coat. The coat you get will look like a normal sweater, but with a warmth factor of 25. The worn color you get will vary randomly. Updated 4/26/16 for build 34. Bugfixed missing sweater icon.

673346418.name: CureWildMeatV2.1
673346418.desc: Dangalong's Cure Wild Meat mod adds the ability to cure meat from wild animals and fish into jerky-like food items with a long shelf-life, which are ready-to-eat and can also be used in cooking. Level 5 Cooking is required for this valuable skill. Curing meat reduces the nutrition of the original cut slightly and adds +10 thirst when eaten alone, but will stay good for 60-90 days. After salting the meat must then be cooked to become safe to eat as well as fully cured. Cooking time for curing salted meat is considerably longer than for normal food items. Recipes only work on vanilla wild animals and fish for now, except rabbits from UngratefulDead's Hunting mod, and Rabbit Cutlets from my Rabbit Pelt Tanning mod. The salting recipe is also compatible with the salt item gained from Deadend's Canning Mod as well as the base salt. Made compatible with build 34 nutrition system. Added curing of frog meat. Updated 4/30/16.

只是个纯粹的娱乐插件，强迫症患者专用

Are you still in trouble for your character to be 27 years old?

If in the sandbox to modify the start year, you change your age according to the set.
